mapper.insert: insert into USERS (MEMBERID, PASSWORD, EMAIL, NAME, REGDATE, ADMINCK, POINT, USER_IDX) values(#{memberId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, sysdate, 2, 10000, USER_IDX_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
mapper.select: select memberId, password, email, name, adminck, point, user_idx, regdate from users where memberId = #{memberId}
